readsRaw.description: Total number of raw input reads, i.e. before adapter trimming and filtering

readsPerc.description: Percentage of reads that are used for the analysis, i.e. that are not filtered out due to quality or length criterion

adapterDimerPerc.description: The percentage of reads that correspond to adapter-dimer, i.e. those that are shorter or equal to 2nt after adapter trimming

detectedMatureSA.description: The number of detected microRNAs (applying single assignment)

maturePercofReads.description: The percentage of effective reads assigned to mature microRNAs

meanofp50.description: This is the average Phred Score of the median scores at a given position

mainPeakMiRNAlength.description: The percentage of miRNA-assigned reads of lengths 21, 22 and 23

stdDevMiRNAlength.description: The standard deviation of the read lengths of he reads mapped to microRNAs

reads.description: Number of reads that are used for the analysis, i.e. that are not filtered out due to quality or length criterion

readsAdapterFound.description: Number of reads for which the adapter was found (and trimmed).  Fail to detect he adapter can have several reasons: i) bad sequencing quality towards the 3' end of the read (sequencing errors impede the detection of the adapter), ii) longer fragments for which the adapter is not sequenced, iii) the wrong adapter sequence was specified

readsAdapterFoundPerc.description: Percentage of reads for which the adapter was found (and trimmed).  Fail to detect he adapter can have several reasons: i) bad sequencing quality towards the 3' end of the read (sequencing errors impede the detection of the adapter), ii) longer fragments for which the adapter is not sequenced, iii) the wrong adapter sequence was specified

readsUnique.description: The number of unique sequence reads after read collapsing

avgRCperUnique.full_name: Number of reads per unique read
avgRCperUnique.description: The number of reads in analysis divided by the number of unique reads

meanofmeans.description: The mean Phred Scores are obtained from FastQC per position, then the average of these values are calculated using positions 1 to 40

meanofp10.description: The Phred Scores of percentile 10 are obtained from FastQC per position, then the average of these values are calculated using positions 1 to 40

meanofp25.description: The Phred Scores of percentile 25 are obtained from FastQC per position, then the average of these values are calculated using positions 1 to 40

meanofp75.description: The Phred Scores of percentile 175 are obtained from FastQC per position, then the average of these values are calculated using positions 1 to 40

meanofp90.description: The Phred Scores of percentile 90 are obtained from FastQC per position, then the average of these values are calculated using positions 1 to 40

ultraShortReadsPerc.description: Percentage of reads between 3 and 14 nt. A high number is usually indicative of issues in library preparation or low RNA quality

shortReadsPerc.description: Percentage of reads between 15 and 17 nt. This range was choosen because tRNA fragments are frequently of 18 nt length.
